com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity
 

  • Uses of ServiceBindingDestinationLoader in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

    Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity that implement ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    IdentityAuthenticationServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    A ServiceBindingDestinationLoader that loads destinations from service bindings backed by the Identity Authentication Service (IAS).
    final class 
    MegacliteServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    Representation of the Megaclite service as provided in Deploy with Confidence landscapes.
    class 
    OAuth2ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    An implementation of the ServiceBindingDestinationLoader interface that is capable of producing OAuth2 based HttpDestination instances.
    Methods in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity that return ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    ServiceBindingDestinationLoader.defaultLoaderChain()
    Returns the default loader chain instance.
    static ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    ServiceBindingDestinationLoader.newLoaderChain(List<ServiceBindingDestinationLoader> delegateLoaders)
    Returns a new loader chain instance that will query the provided delegateLoaders in the provided order to try to transform the provided ServiceBindingDestinationOptions into an HttpDestination.
    Method parameters in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity with type arguments of type ServiceBindingDestinationLoader

    Description
    static ServiceBindingDestinationLoader
    ServiceBindingDestinationLoader.newLoaderChain(List<ServiceBindingDestinationLoader> delegateLoaders)
    Returns a new loader chain instance that will query the provided delegateLoaders in the provided order to try to transform the provided ServiceBindingDestinationOptions into an HttpDestination.
